items.name: func set([Component])
items.desc: Adds all the component in the input array to the set.

items.name: subscript(Component.Type) -> Component?
items.desc: Gets or sets the component of the specified type.

items.name: subscript<T>(T.Type) -> T?
items.desc: Gets or sets the component of the specified type.

items.name: func has(Component.Type) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the set contains a component of the given type.
